translations: 骑士精神（复数 chivalries）；骑士制度

sentences.sentence: The Order of the Garter is an ancient order of chivalry.
sentences.translation: 嘉德勋位是古老的骑士勋位。

sentences.sentence: He has been described as the creature and embodiment of the age of chivalry.
sentences.translation: 他被描述为骑士时代的产物和化身。

sentences.sentence: This courtly poetry came out of the idea of chivalry and courtly love that you might associate with knights in shining armor.
sentences.translation: 这种宫廷风格的诗歌来源于骑士精神和宫廷式的爱情，你可能会把它与穿着闪亮盔甲的骑士联系在一起。
